remarks: A finite sum divided by a constant.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsummulc2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsummulc2.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
fsummulc2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumdivc.4 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
fsumdivc $p |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. A B / C ) = sum_ k e. A ( B / C ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d C k $.
$d k ph $.
